author: jszakmeister
msg: Fix 'svn export -rBASE' when the working copy contains added files and/or
(copy_versioned_files): If the revision is not WORKING, then don't process
files or directories scheduled for addition.
(export_working_copy_with_mods): Add another case in which 'kappa' is
scheduled for addition, but hasn't been committed.
(export_working_copy_at_base_revision): Add 'kappa' to the working copy, and
ensure that it isn't exported.  Edit a copy-and-pasted comment to be more

author: lundblad
msg: * STATUS: Vote for r11211 group and add and vote for r11294.

author: lundblad
msg: Fix issue #2090.  Fix out-of-bounds error which lead to sending non-XML-safe
cast the char to an unsigned char, instead of an int, so that negative
char values don't get interpreted as negative ints.
